results.title: Statin-Induced Rhabdomyolysis Due to Pharmacokinetic Changes From Biliary Obstruction in a Patient With Metastatic Prostate Cancer
results.journal: J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep
results.text_hl: A rare adverse interaction between @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_abiraterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089740 @@@abiraterone@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Abiraterone_Acetate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069501 @@@Zytiga@@@), an androgen biosynthesis inhibitor, was observed in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with mCRPC due to pharmacokinetic changes resulting from @<m>DISEASE_Jaundice_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D041781 @@@obstructive jaundice@@@.

citations.NLM: Desikan SP, Sobash P, Fisher A, Desikan R. Statin-Induced Rhabdomyolysis Due to Pharmacokinetic Changes From Biliary Obstruction in a Patient With Metastatic Prostate Cancer J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep. 2020 Jan-Dec;8():2324709620947275. PMID: 32755252
citations.BibTeX: @article{32755252, title={Statin-Induced Rhabdomyolysis Due to Pharmacokinetic Changes From Biliary Obstruction in a Patient With Metastatic Prostate Cancer}, author={Desikan SP and Sobash P and Fisher A and Desikan R}, journal={J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep}, volume={8}, pages={2324709620947275}}

results.title: Simvastatin augments activation of liver regeneration through attenuating transforming growth factor-beta1 induced-apoptosis in obstructive jaundice rats
results.text_hl: The detailed molecular mechanism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@) involvement in liver regeneration during @<m>DISEASE_Jaundice_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D041781 @@@obstructive jaundice@@@ progression remains poorly elucidated.

citations.NLM: Fang D, He Y, Luan Z. Simvastatin augments activation of liver regeneration through attenuating transforming growth factor-beta1 induced-apoptosis in obstructive jaundice rats Exp Ther Med. 2017 Nov;14(5):4839-4845. PMID: 29201188
citations.BibTeX: @article{29201188, title={Simvastatin augments activation of liver regeneration through attenuating transforming growth factor-beta1 induced-apoptosis in obstructive jaundice rats}, author={Fang D and He Y and Luan Z}, journal={Exp Ther Med}, volume={14}, number={5}, pages={4839-4845}}
